description:
Enjoy your experience on the water without fussing with your PFD. The Nora is designed specifically for female boaters, with a low-profile back panel that fits any paddling or rowing seat. Multiple adjustment points let you dial in the perfect fit and front pockets keep sunscreen and snacks close at hand. Strap garages let you stow excess webbing out of your way.

  • Performance Level 70 PFD with sea level buoyancy of 7.6kg
  • 5-panel design allows unrestricted movement
  • Thin back construction reduces bulk
  • Front-zip access with 7 adjustment points for a custom and secure fit
  • 1 front lash point
  • 2 front zippered pockets store paddling essentials
  • Reflective trim for night visibility
  • XS/M is rated for users 88-132lbs. L/XL is rated for users over 90lbs
  • Certified by Transport Canada and the US Coast Guard
name: NRS Nora PFD - Women's
